article_title: Team Obama tells parents to talk to kids about healthcare this Christmas
article_text:
You have to hand it to team Obama’s group Organizing For America. They are a persistent bunch, and they sure know how to celebrate the holidays – chatting with the kids around the hearth about Obamacare, of course!

The homespun looking tweets just make you want to sing “ Don we now our fun apparel ” and become a liberal, right?

Here’s the truth: Children listen to their parents (mostly). #GetTalking about health care: http://t.co/Rr7U8VyuSo pic.twitter.com/cpMTAqt066 — OFA TruthTeam (@OFATruthTeam) November 15, 2013

Spread the word about getting health insurance this holiday season: http://t.co/SherLxrLOQ#GetTalkingpic.twitter.com/YK8vtpFsFA — Barack Obama (@BarackObama) November 15, 2013

Hmm . . . for some reason responses were a little snarky:

Even when their god bleeds, they don’t see blood. MT @RBPundit It’s not a cult. It’s not a cult. It’s not a cult. https://t.co/7sVNrfjxLn — AmishDude (@TheAmishDude) November 15, 2013

@RBPundit@FriedrichHayek Hey kids, us adults are wrecking your future because we think money grows on trees. Happy holidays, suckers! — Mark Trueblood (@MarkTrueblood) November 15, 2013

H/T : Twitchy

School cancels Christmas toy drive over anti-religious group’s lawsuit threat

[poll id=”138″]
